boardgame.name: Wildcatters
boardgame.description: Wildcatters is a tactical and strategic board game set during the booming business of the 19th century oil industry!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players are oil barons who develop oil fields; bid for oil rights; and build rigs, oil tankers, trains, and refineries. Your goal is to deliver more oil barrels to the continents than the other players while also collecting more shares and money than them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game lasts seven rounds with four players, and the game set-up is the same for each player, with three rigs, two trains, one tanker and one refinery being placed on the board. The game board features a world map divided into eight areas where you can find oil. Players choose an open area card and get money to build rigs, tankers, trains and refineries, after which they can buy oil actions. The players work together in an oilfield to find oil at a lower cost. The players transport oil together to the refineries, using trains and tankers from other players to deliver oil to the refineries _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and all with one purpose: deliver more oil than the other players by the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 125 -- We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re Just Not Here Tonight
Heavy Cardboard Episode 1 – Madeira and Getting to Know You!
Heavy Cardboard Episode 39 – Top 50 Favorite Games of Right Now
Heavy Cardboard Episode 52 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Amanda_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Top 50 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Edward_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Top 50
The Good the Board and the Classified Episode 165 Tabletop Taxonomy
The Good the Board and the Hattanooga Choo Choo Episode 163 Train Games
The Good the Board and the Professionals: Episode 166 Designer Showcase 1
The Good, the Board, and the Choo Choo! Episode 154 Andy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Top Ten Games

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
